site.title: Web Tools
site.description: Free and useful web tools collection
site.tagline: Collection of handy tools for everyday use

tax-calculator.name: Tax Calculator
tax-calculator.description: Calculate price with or without tax

section1.title: Tax Calculator Overview
section1.content:
The Tax Calculator is a tool that easily calculates tax-inclusive prices, tax-exclusive prices, and tax amounts.

"Wait, is this excluding or including tax?" "How much is 10%?"
For those who have frozen in front of the register, this is probably not uncommon.

With this tool, you can calculate tax amounts instantly just by entering the amount.

section2.title: Tool Features
section2.feature1: One-click conversion between tax-inclusive and tax-exclusive - Automatically calculates tax amount and total from the input amount.
section2.feature2: Supports tax rate changes - Tax rate can be changed to 8%, 10%, etc. Also useful for checking reduced tax rates.
section2.feature3: No registration required, instant use - Browser-based tool ready to use when you need it.

section3.title: Main Uses
section3.use3: Final price check after discount + tax
section3.use4: Reality check: "Is this really within budget?"

section4.title: A Little Tip
section4.content:
Consumption tax is calculated as "price excluding tax × tax rate," but in practice, rounding (floor, ceiling, rounding) may occur.

This tool is based on general calculation methods, but please follow each store's accounting rules for final amounts.

section1.title: Discount Calculator Overview
section1.content:
The Discount Calculator is a tool that instantly calculates discount rates and discounted prices.

"How much is 30% off actually?"
"Is half price really cheap?"
"What percentage is the second item half off?"

Pull out your smartphone on the spot and calculate immediately. An essential tool for protecting your "reason" while shopping.

section2.title: Tool Features
section2.feature1: Calculate final price from discount rate - Just enter the original price and discount rate to display the payment amount.
section2.feature2: Reverse calculate discount rate from discounted price - "How much am I saving?" also calculated instantly.
section2.feature3: Simple design - No unnecessary features. Ready to use immediately.

section3.title: Main Uses
section3.use4: Finding "reasons not to buy" rather than "reasons to buy"

section4.title: A Half-Joking Reality
section4.content:
70% off is a good deal.
But "things you won't use" are 100% wasteful.

This tool is your supporter in protecting your wallet and sanity.

section5.title: About Privacy
section5.content: All calculations are completed within your browser. Input data is never transmitted externally.

section1.title: Age Calculator Overview
section1.content:
The Age Calculator is a tool that instantly calculates "current age," "X years X months," and "how many days since birth" simply by entering a birthdate.

"Let's see... it's 2026 now... 2026 − 1993... wait, my birthday hasn't come yet... huh?"
—Say goodbye to such "mental age bugs" today.

It automatically determines leap year calculations and whether birthdays have passed, so you can quickly confirm accurate ages.

section2.title: Tool Features
section2.feature1: Automatically calculate accurate age as of today - Automatically determines whether the birthday has passed. Displays precise age, not just "approximately X years old."
section2.feature2: Display days since birth - Seeing "You have been alive for XX days" gives you a somewhat grand feeling. (※ May suddenly make you reflect on life)
section2.feature3: Simple input - Just select the birthdate. No registration required, free to use.

section3.title: Main Uses
section3.use1: Verifying age when creating resumes and profiles
section3.use2: Calculating a child's age in months
section3.use4: Sweet confirmation like "How many days have we been together?" (we take no responsibility)

section4.title: Important Notes
section4.content: This tool operates in your browser, and input data is not transmitted to servers. Information will not be retained when you close the page, so please use it with confidence.

section1.title: Calendar Overview
section1.content:
This is a yearly calendar tool that allows you to check Japanese holidays and rokuyō (six weekdays) at a glance. It also features a business days calculation and counter function, perfect for project deadline management and workday counting.

"Wait, is this day a holiday?" "When is taian this month?" "How many business days until the deadline?"
No more pulling out your planner or searching on your phone.

With this tool, you can check holidays, rokuyō, and business days count for the entire year at once.

section2.title: Tool Features
section2.feature1: Display all 12 months at once - View the entire year's calendar with a single scroll.
section2.feature2: Complete coverage of Japanese holidays - Accurately displays holidays and substitute holidays through 2030. Easy to check long weekends.
section2.feature3: Rokuyō filter function - Filter by Sensho, Tomobiki, Senbu, Butsumetsu, Taian, or Shakku with one click. Convenient for planning ceremonies.
section2.feature4: Business Days Calculation & Counter - Simply click the start and end dates to automatically calculate working days excluding weekends and holidays. Perfect for project deadline management, estimation creation, and workload calculation. Check your schedule based on actual working days in an instant.

section3.title: Main Uses
section3.use1: Checking long holidays and extended weekends
section3.use3: Business days calculation & project deadline management (workload estimation, schedule confirmation)
section3.use4: Answering simple questions like "When is the next 3-day weekend?"

section4.title: How to Use Business Days Calculation
section4.content:
The business days calculation feature makes project deadline management and workload estimation seamless.

Usage is simple. Click the start date on the calendar, then click the end date. A popup will appear in the top-right corner, displaying the number of business days (working days excluding weekends and holidays) within the selected period.

It instantly solves common business questions like "How many working days will this task take?" "How many business days until the deadline?" "What's the actual workday count for this project period?" Perfect for estimation creation, workload management, project schedule confirmation, and delivery date calculation for various business scenarios.

section5.title: About Rokuyō
section5.content:
Rokuyō is an indicator of fortune and misfortune used in the Japanese calendar.

・Taian: Good day for anything
・Tomobiki: Good for celebrations (funerals avoided)
・Sensho: Morning is auspicious
・Senbu: Afternoon is auspicious
・Butsumetsu: Day to be conservative
・Shakku: Only around noon is auspicious

Click a rokuyō tag to highlight corresponding dates in purple.

csv2json.name: CSV to JSON Converter
csv2json.description: Convert CSV files to JSON format
csv2json.placeholder: Enter CSV data or upload a file...

article.title: How to Use the CSV to JSON Converter

section1.title: About CSV to JSON Converter
section1.content: A free online tool that converts CSV files to JSON format. It runs entirely in your browser, ensuring security and privacy. Your data is never sent to a server. Supports CSV file uploads and text input, with customizable delimiters (comma, semicolon, tab). Converted JSON can be copied or downloaded as a file.

section2.title: Key Features
section2.feature1: CSV file upload support (drag & drop, file selection)
section2.feature4: Header row toggle (auto-generates column1, column2... if no header)
section2.feature5: Supports quoted fields and escaped quotes

section3.title: Use Cases
section3.use1: Data conversion for web applications and APIs
section3.use2: Convert Excel/spreadsheet exports to JSON for programmatic processing
section3.use3: Transform database export data to JSON for frontend consumption
section3.use4: Test data creation and mock data generation during development

section4.title: Usage Tips
section4.content: If your CSV file has a header row, check 'Include header row' to use header names as JSON keys. If unchecked, keys will be auto-generated as column1, column2, etc. If your CSV uses a non-standard delimiter (semicolon or tab instead of comma), select the appropriate option from 'Delimiter'. The tool handles quoted fields and escaped quotes ("") correctly, ensuring accurate conversion of complex CSV data.

section1.title: UUID Overview
section1.content: UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) is a standard for generating globally unique identifiers. Represented as a 128-bit number, it is widely used as an identifier that is virtually impossible to duplicate. A key feature is the ability to generate unique IDs independently anywhere without a central management server.

section2.title: UUID v4 Characteristics
section2.content: UUID v4, generated by this tool, is created based on random values. Theoretically, the probability of collision (generating the same value) is extremely low and practically negligible. Even generating 1 billion UUIDs per second, the probability of collision would not reach 50% even after 100 years.

section3.title: UUID Format
section3.content: UUIDs are expressed as hexadecimal strings separated by hyphens in the format 8-4-4-4-12. For example:
section3.note: Total of 36 characters (including hyphens), consisting of 32 hexadecimal digits.

section4.title: Common Uses of UUID
section4.use1: Database primary keys (uniquely identifying records generated across multiple systems)
section4.use2: Session IDs and tracking IDs (user tracking in web applications)
section4.use3: API request IDs (request identification in distributed systems)
section4.use4: File names and resource identifiers (when duplication must be avoided)

section5.title: Important Notes
section5.content: While UUIDs are difficult to guess, they are not suitable for use as security tokens. For authentication and authorization, use dedicated cryptographically secure methods. Also, UUIDs are not secret information, so use them for purposes where public exposure is acceptable.

section6.title: What This Tool Offers
section6.content: This UUID generation tool can generate up to 20 UUID v4s at once. Generated UUIDs can be copied to the clipboard with one click. Use it conveniently for development work, test data creation, and various other scenarios.

section1.title: History Calculator Overview
section1.content: The History Calculator is a calculator tool that records and saves calculation processes, allowing you to review and reuse them later. Unlike regular calculators, past calculation results are automatically saved as history, making it convenient when comparing multiple calculations or redoing previous calculations. It is particularly useful when dealing with multiple numbers, such as household budget calculations or creating estimates.

section2.title: History Features
section2.content: In the History Calculator, calculation results are automatically saved in list format. On mobile displays, new history is added at the bottom, while on PC displays, it stacks from top to bottom. Each history item is recorded in the format "expression = result," and you can recall past calculation expressions simply by tapping or clicking. History can be deleted individually or cleared all at once.

section3.title: Editing and Real-time Preview
section3.content: The input field is freely editable, and intermediate calculation values are displayed in real-time. For example, entering "10 + 20 + 30" will show "10," "30," and "60" step by step below the expression. This feature allows you to quickly identify where mistakes were made in long calculation expressions. It also supports keyboard shortcuts, with Enter for calculation and Escape for clear.

section4.title: Main Uses
section4.use1: Household budget totals (recording daily expense and income calculations)
section4.use2: Creating estimates (calculating multiple items and checking totals)
section4.use3: Tax-inclusive price calculations (saving history of tax additions and discount calculations)
section4.use4: Receipt verification (comparing shopping totals with actual receipts)

section5.title: Important Notes
section5.content: History is saved only in browser memory, so it will be lost when you reload the page. For calculation results you want to keep long-term, we recommend saving them separately in notes or screenshots. Also, this tool prioritizes privacy, and input data is never transmitted to servers.

section6.title: What This Tool Offers
section6.content: The History Calculator supports basic four arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) and can handle complex calculations using parentheses. Input supports both mouse/touch operations and keyboard operations. Numbers are automatically displayed with thousand separators for easy reading. Any number of calculation history items can be saved, and they can be individually deleted or cleared all at once as needed.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Before using this service ("Web Tools"), please read the following Terms of Service carefully. By using this service, you agree to these terms.

section2.title: 2. Service Content
section2.content: This service provides various free web tools including calculators, converters, and text processing tools.

section3.title: 3. Disclaimer
section3.content: This service does not guarantee the accuracy of calculation results or conversion outputs. Use of the tools is at your own risk. We assume no responsibility for any damages arising from the use of this service.

section4.title: 4. Privacy
section4.content: This service does not store your input data on our servers. All processing is performed within your browser. For details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

section5.title: 5. Prohibited Acts
section5.content:
The following acts are prohibited when using this service:
・Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
・Acts that interfere with the operation of this service
・Acts that disadvantage other users or third parties
・Acts that place excessive load on this service

section6.title: 6. Service Changes and Termination
section6.content: We may change the content of this service or terminate the provision of this service without prior notice.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
section7.content: We may change these terms as necessary. Changed terms will take effect when posted on this site.

section8.title: 8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section8.content: These terms shall be governed by Japanese law. In the event of any dispute, the Tokyo District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction as the court of first instance.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Web Tools respects user privacy and is committed to protecting personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content:
This service may collect the following information:
・Access logs (IP address, browser information, access date and time, etc.)
・Cookies (for improving site usability)

section2.title: 2. Data Storage
section2.content: All tools provided by this service are processed entirely within your browser. Data you enter (formulas, text, conversion data, etc.) is not transmitted to our servers and is not stored.

section3.title: 3. Use of Cookies
section3.content: This service uses cookies to improve user experience, such as storing dark mode settings. Cookies can be disabled in browser settings, but some features may not work properly.

section4.title: 4. Advertising
section4.content: This service may use third-party advertising services such as Google AdSense. These advertisers may use cookies to deliver ads based on user interests.

section5.title: 5. Analytics Tools
section5.content: This service may use analytics tools such as Google Analytics to understand service usage. These tools collect information using cookies but do not include personally identifiable information.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Privacy Policy
section6.content: This policy may be changed without notice due to legal changes or service content changes.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: For inquiries regarding this privacy policy, please contact us through the contact form.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions, feedback, or bug reports about this service, please contact us using the form below.
contact.note: ※ Depending on the content of your inquiry, it may take some time to respond.
